text: Hello! I've built a web app using Genie + Stipple and I would like to deploy it to my website (i.e. with a julia process running in the background). Has anyone done this before?

elements.text: Hello! I've built a web app using Genie + Stipple and I would like to deploy it to my website (i.e. with a julia process running in the background). Has anyone done this before?

text: Can we cross post this publicly to <https://discourse.julialang.org|Discourse> for further visibility? React with :bridge: on the message above to approve. <https://github.com/JuliaCommunity/SlackBridge/blob/main/README.md#faq|More info here>
Apologies, this isn't a pure Julia question, but I wouldn't know where to ask this otherwise.

text: it’s a good idea to cross post to discourse for genie though

text: Success, it has been cross posted <https://discourse.julialang.org/t/hello-ive-built-a-web-app-using-genie-stipple-and-i-would-like-to-deploy-it-to|to Discourse>. Keep and eye out on Discourse for responses and please add an answer there once you are satisfied with the solution so others can benefit as well. Happy debugging!
<@U01LG72UQMC> I replied on Discourse - feel free to follow up there or ping me if you get stuck :slightly_smiling_face: Let me know how it goes
